page.title: 14LOCAL NEWS ITEMS (CONT).
page.content: RAILWAY TRIBUTE- to mark the close ties between British Steels Cumbria and British Rail a locomotive will be named 'British Steel Workington'. GARDEN FOR THE DISABLED-The Mansion Garden for the Disabled in Workington has been built with the aid of probationary young offenders and Allerdale District Council. GYPSY PROBLEM-a Lillyhall (Workington) firm has threatened to transfer it's operations to a Leeds factory if the plans for siting of a gypsy site nearby are approved.Allerdale District Councill are desperately trying to find a permanent site for the gypsies. PACE SETTER -an electonics firm, Polkinghorn Industries, in Workington has laid claim to the title of 'fastest growing industry in Cumbria'.
